Join

Take a look at our schedule and come join us at the lab, lectures, or Journal Club meetings where we discuss potential projects and scientific papers. General use of lab equipment and supplies is $35/month. To become a paying member, please contact Cameron Clarke at sdwetlab@gmail.com to set up recurring Paypal payment. We look forward to seeing you!
